name: Next Step
description: A job posting application to aid homeless populations; potential employees can browse jobs and contact managers if they are interested, while employers can create accounts and post new jobs.

name: Recipes by Nutrition
description: An application where a user enters a type of meal and is presented with a recipe, as well as the recipe's nutritional information.

name: Employee Directory
description: An application that provides a list of 200 employees, as well as the option to sort them by last name or search by any letter in their name.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: A virtual restaurant app where viewers can devour burgers at the click of a button, add new burgers through an input form, and delete burgers once they have been devoured.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: An application where a user can enter a city and view the current weather for the city, as well as the 5-day forecast for the future.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: An application where a user can schedule events for the work hours of 9 to 5, view the current hour, and log them into their local storage.
